title: However, if FSI on payment of premium is permissible over and above the FSI allowed without payment of premium to certain user in Regulation No
clause_text: However, if FSI on payment of premium is permissible over and above the FSI allowed without payment of premium to certain user in Regulation No.4.11, then the maximum FSI on payment of premium for such user shall be permissible to the extent of such permissible FSI on payment of premium or 0.40, whichever is minimum,

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
